meanings.definition: A place where chickens are kept.
meanings.sent1: The hennery in the backyard is where all the chickens live.
meanings.sent2: We visited the hennery to collect fresh eggs for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to sneak into the hennery to chase the chickens.
meanings.sent4: The hennery was a bustling village of clucking residents.
meanings.sent5: The hennery smelled of feathers and hay, a comforting scent of farm life.

meanings.definition: The act of raising or breeding chickens.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa's hennery business kept him busy all year round.
meanings.sent2: Learning about hennery techniques helped us become better chicken farmers.
meanings.sent3: The hennery hobby turned into a profitable side business for the family.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the hennery was evident in the healthy flock she raised.
meanings.sent5: The hennery required patience and hard work, but the rewards were worth it.

meanings.sent1: The noisy hennery woke us up at the crack of dawn.
meanings.sent2: The hennery strutted around the yard, pecking at the ground.
meanings.sent3: The hennery gathered around the scarecrow, curious but cautious.
meanings.sent4: The hennery huddled together during the storm, seeking safety in numbers.
meanings.sent5: The hennery roamed freely in the open field, enjoying the sunshine.
